subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] another nothin' or another somethin'?
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
I checked out all the pics. I see faces in there, as
for the cat one nope i dont see a cat but it is
"somethin" I was more interested in the bearded man
over to the far left of the image. I get alot of the
"somethins" + bearded man in the same pics. I usually
just say alien looking guy and bearded man hehehe

The dual/stretched face images are also similar to
some of the ones ive gotten over the years. 

I just added some new ones to the New gallery myself.
I used ratkas imnage of his laser board and video
recorded it then rerecorded the video i had just
recorded using it as raw footage for the light source.
Had a few good ones pop up. I dont care what the
ghosthunters or even what other researchers here think
of my methods. I am more interested in learning more
and expanding my mind than proving any of this is
real.

If they want to talk about whats real or whats not
real I always just jump to the "what if you are all
just a figment of my own imagination and vice versa"
when they can find the proof for either side of that
battle then we will discuss it more. hehehe 

Good stuff keep at it. Glad to see your having a go at
video again tho I think we may need to update you and
get you a webcam to make it easier on ya on the video
end.

Misty
--- Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:

> 
> No self respecting "ghost hunter" would even look at
> this, let alone consider it. Maybe it's not blobby
> enough lookng?
